Package thothbot.parallax.core.client.shaders

Here are all shaders and shader's related code.

Interface Summary
Chunks Source for all chunks.
Shader.DefaultResources  
 

Class Summary
Attribute  
BasicShader Basic shader.
ChunksFragmentShader Chunks used in Fragment Shader
ChunksVertexShader Chunks used in Vertex Shader
CubeMapShader CubeGeometry map shader.
DepthRGBAShader Depth encoding into RGBA texture.
DepthShader Simple depth shader.
FresnelShader Fresnel shader.
LambertShader Lambert shader.
NormalMapShader Normal map shader
- Blinn-Phong
- normal + diffuse + specular + AO + displacement + reflection + shadow maps
- point and directional lights (use with "lights: true" material option) Based on three.js code.
NormalShader Normal shader.
ParticleBasicShader Simple Particle shader.
PhongShader Phong shading - lighting model three-dimensional objects, including models and polygonal primitives.
ProgramParameters  
Shader Basic abstract shader.
Uniform Shader's uniforms.
UniformsLib Some common uniforms used by shaders.
